definitions.definition: To deliver ( information ) in the form of a program , especially an audio program, over the Internet on a regular basis for playback on computers or portable devices such as mobile phones .
To deliver a program, especially an audio program, over the Internet on a regular basis for playback on computers or portable devices such as mobile phones.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To deliver ( information ) in the form of a program , especially an audio program, over the Internet on a regular basis for playback on computers or portable devices such as mobile phones . [from early 21st c.]
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To deliver a program, especially an audio program, over the Internet on a regular basis for playback on computers or portable devices such as mobile phones. [from early 21st c.]
